answers.answer: My daughter weighed 5 lbs 10 oz at 35 wks. I'm now 37 and feel she may come soon
Where are you from ladies ? I haven't seen or heard my little one since 20 weeks ! 35+4 days now and don't know if she's Heavy or if she's head down or anything! I'm from Wales UK
At 31+2 my baby was estimated at 3lbs. Hes a mini man lol going to be small.
At my last ultrasound bub was measuring a bit ahead. At 33w2d he/she was already estimated at 5.5 pounds. I'm now 35w2d

So far, at 24 weeks, my little one was already an estimated 1 lb 11 ounces.  I was told that at this rate, by the time I hit 26 weeks (I'll be 25 weeks in 2 days), the baby will already be 1/2 the size I was when I was born (I was a 4 lb 1 ounce preemie).

I also haven't had an US since 20 weeks.  I am now 40w3d and I have never once with this pregnancy heard about how big she is.  They always just say everything looks good and she's on track. (Good enough for me.) I might ask what they think she is measuring at my appt this afternoon, but this is my second and my bump is only slightly bigger than last time, so I think she'll be a similar size to what her sister was at birth (7lbs 6oz.) I remember that with my first they always thought that she was going to be bigger from looking at the US, but when my doctor used his hands to feel around my belly right before her birth he guessed her size and was only an oz off. Early on I was told I was going to have a baby larger than 8lbs!
I'm 33 weeks, baby was 4lbs 12oz last week :) he's so big!
I'm 37 weeks and yesterday my doctor told me I'm having a big baby, no ultrasound that was her just feeling around
Well I was just diagnosed with gestational diabetes :( they said my baby will be large. I'm so upset..everything that could go wrong has in this pregnancy...cant wait for my guy to be here!

Had our latest scan last week at 28 weeks they said our son was already 3.5 pounds and in their opinion on the larger side...2 of our daughters were 10 pounders so I'm expecting to be similar again. I'm not too worried though I think bigger babies are a little easier to deliver as the weight of them helps themselves out a bit and I found I didn't get exhausted pushing hard to get a small baby to move down. Good luck to all.
Also no gest diabetes with this or any of our other pregnancies...just big well grown Maori babies lol
So I asked at my appt yesterday and he said that she is probably close to 8lbs now from feeling around with his hand on my belly.  I'm 40w4d today.

Im 26 wks 4days, had dr appt yesterday. I go for my blood sugar test in 2 weeks, and my 30 week ultrasound in 4weeks. Im excited dr said they'll get some 3d pictures this time, and check babys size and weight. Maybe it depends on insurance carrier if they do 30week ultrasound or not?
Had an us at 34 weeks 4 days and he was 4lbs 7oz :). Im 36 weeks now

question: I just had an ultrasound done today and my little man (Liam) is weighing in at 3 lbs 6 oz. and I'm 29 weeks 1 day. How much do your LO's weigh and how far along are you?
title: Your babies weight
